```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(glue)

# Read team data once at the beginning
team <- read_csv("data/team-members.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

Our work on the **POPCORN-NCD Reporting Guideline** is led by an international collaborative group committed to transparency and rigour in simulation-modelling research.

---

## Leads

<!--
COORDINATOR: Leadership section is AUTO-GENERATED from data/team-members.csv

To add/update leads:
1. Open data/team-members.csv
2. Add/edit rows where Section = "Leads"
3. Commit the CSV file - site will rebuild automatically

CSV Columns needed: Section, Name, Credentials, Institution, Country, Expertise, Role, ORCID, Photo
-->

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

# Filter for Leads
leads <- team %>% filter(Section == "Leads")

if (nrow(leads) > 0) {
  cat('::: {.team-grid}\n\n')

  for (i in 1:nrow(leads)) {
    # Start card
    cat('::: {.team-member}\n\n')

    # Photo (if provided)
    if (!is.na(leads$Photo[i]) && leads$Photo[i] != "") {
      cat('![', leads$Name[i], '](', leads$Photo[i], '){.img-circle width="100"}\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # Name and credentials
    cat('**', leads$Name[i], sep='')
    if (!is.na(leads$Credentials[i]) && leads$Credentials[i] != "") {
      cat(', ', leads$Credentials[i], sep='')
    }
    cat('**\n\n')

    # Institution
    cat('*', leads$Institution[i], '*\n\n', sep='')

    # Country
    if (!is.na(leads$Country[i]) && leads$Country[i] != "") {
      cat(leads$Country[i], '\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # Expertise
    if (!is.na(leads$Expertise[i]) && leads$Expertise[i] != "") {
      cat('**Expertise:** ', leads$Expertise[i], '\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # Role
    if (!is.na(leads$Role[i]) && leads$Role[i] != "") {
      cat('**Role:** ', leads$Role[i], '\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # ORCID
    if (!is.na(leads$ORCID[i]) && leads$ORCID[i] != "") {
      cat('[<img src="assets/icons/orcid.svg" class="inline-icon" alt="ORCID"> ORCID](https://orcid.org/', leads$ORCID[i], ')\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # End card
    cat(':::\n\n')
  }

  cat(':::\n\n')
} else {
  cat('*Leadership team to be announced.*\n\n')
}
```

## Strategic Advisory Group

<!--
COORDINATOR: SAG is AUTO-GENERATED from data/team-members.csv

CSV Columns needed: Section, Name, Credentials, Institution, Country, Expertise, Position, ORCID, Photo
Note: Position field is optional - use "Ex Officio" for ex officio members
-->

Our Strategic Advisory Group (SAG) provides expert guidance on the development and implementation of POPCORN-NCD reporting guidelines. Members represent diverse geographical regions, methodological expertise, and stakeholder perspectives.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

# Filter for SAG
sag <- team %>% filter(Section == "SAG")

if (nrow(sag) > 0) {
  cat('::: {.team-grid}\n\n')

  for (i in 1:nrow(sag)) {
    # Start card
    cat('::: {.team-member}\n\n')

    # Photo (if provided)
    if (!is.na(sag$Photo[i]) && sag$Photo[i] != "") {
      cat('![', sag$Name[i], '](', sag$Photo[i], '){.img-circle width="100"}\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # Name and credentials
    cat('**', sag$Name[i], sep='')
    if (!is.na(sag$Credentials[i]) && sag$Credentials[i] != "") {
      cat(', ', sag$Credentials[i], sep='')
    }
    cat('**')

    # Position (ex officio)
    if (!is.na(sag$Position[i]) && sag$Position[i] != "") {
      cat(' *(', sag$Position[i], ')*', sep='')
    }
    cat('\n\n')

    # Institution
    cat('*', sag$Institution[i], '*\n\n', sep='')

    # Country
    if (!is.na(sag$Country[i]) && sag$Country[i] != "") {
      cat(sag$Country[i], '\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # Expertise
    if (!is.na(sag$Expertise[i]) && sag$Expertise[i] != "") {
      cat('**Expertise:** ', sag$Expertise[i], '\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # ORCID
    if (!is.na(sag$ORCID[i]) && sag$ORCID[i] != "") {
      cat('[<img src="assets/icons/orcid.svg" class="inline-icon" alt="ORCID"> ORCID](https://orcid.org/', sag$ORCID[i], ')\n\n', sep='')
    }

    # End card
    cat(':::\n\n')
  }

  cat(':::\n\n')
} else {
  cat('*Members to be announced.*\n\n')
}
```
